title: Yasuo nerf ideas (Yasuo mains, you can go away)
body:
Passive: Remove 1 of his passives or nerf his shield, it's really annoying that you can't poke him
Q: Make it so he needs 3 stacks
W: Make it like Braum's shield
E: Make that goddamn cooldown bigger, like 2/1.7/1.5/1.3/1.1 
R: No complaints.

replies.body: I think any one of those would be enough, having more than 1 of those would pretty much make him unplayable.
